item.title: Graffiti on traffic island bollards, 28th December
item.description:

item.title: Continual rubbish and drug paraphernalia, 28th December
item.description:
Every night people park up and throw food needles and other drug paraphernalia out of the car. Has been ongoing for over a year: This is right opposite the nursery entrance to Seabright School. We need a regular cleaning service here.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Audrey Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Spot lights shining into windows, 28th December
item.description:
Two Exceptionally bright Spotlights on building (corner of Fenner Cl. and layard Rd ). These shine directly into windows at back of properties on Banyard Road. Who owns this building? These lights are brighter than all other street lights locally, are pointed horizontal and not shielded. Please look into this
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 28th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camden Grove, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road not swept. Piles of slushy leaves., 28th December
item.description:
The road is rarely swept., Particularly the very end especially in the cul-de-sac outside the last two houses 92 and 94. On the rare occasion that the street cleaning vehicle has been seen in the street, it drives down the middle of the road nowhere near the gutters where the rubbish is collecting the vehicle is not fit for purpose in this road it needs to be done manually, within an attempt to remove leaves collected around parked vehicles and also the curves at the end of the road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandford Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large bench and pots of paints block sidewalk, 28th December
item.description:
A large bench and 10+ pots of paint have been left on the sidewalk for the past 2 months, blocking the sidewalk. This is at the intersection between Brook Drive and Austral Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 119D, Brook Drive, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
